channel.title: CVE Feed for Hgiga -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hgiga -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-35743|2024-09-17T02:37:09.672Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains a SQL injection flaw. Attackers can inject and launch SQL commands in a URL parameter of specific cgi pages.

item.title: CVE-2020-25848|2024-09-17T00:11:14.724Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains weak authentication flaw that attackers grant privilege remotely with default password generation mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2021-22850|2024-09-17T01:16:31.598Z -- hgiga -- oaksv20%20oaklouds-document_v3
item.description: HGiga EIP product lacks ineffective access control in certain pages that allow attackers to access database or perform privileged functions.

item.title: CVE-2021-37912|2024-09-17T01:06:08.105Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds%20oaksv2
item.description: The HGiga OAKlouds mobile portal does not filter special characters of the Ethernet number parameter of the network interface card setting page. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to perform command injection and execute arbitrary commands in the system without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2020-35851|2024-09-17T04:25:22.980Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock does not validate specific parameters properly. Attackers can use the vulnerability to launch Command inject attacks remotely and execute arbitrary commands of the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-4298|2024-08-01T20:33:53.107Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The email search interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4296|2024-08-01T20:33:53.173Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The account management interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-4297|2024-08-01T20:33:53.076Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.
